channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 19:46 Air alarm to Kharkiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 游댮 19:46 Air alarm to Kharkiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 19:45 The threat of shelling! Now in Pokrovskaya territorial community artillery shelling. Put in shelter!
